org.apache.camel.processor.loadbalancer

Interface LoadBalancer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncProcessor, Processor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircuitBreakerLoadBalancer, FailOverLoadBalancer, LoadBalancerSupport, QueueLoadBalancer, RandomLoadBalancer, RoundRobinLoadBalancer, SimpleLoadBalancerSupport, StickyLoadBalancer, TopicLoadBalancer, WeightedLoadBalancer, WeightedRandomLoadBalancer, WeightedRoundRobinLoadBalancer

    public interface LoadBalancer
extends AsyncProcessor
    A strategy for load balancing across a number of Processor instances
    Version:
